summary: Most bitcoin mining stocks were down on Thursday.
author: Kristin Majcher
The Block
title: Bitcoin mining stock report: Thursday, November 3
content: Most bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block fell in the markets on Thursday.
Bitcoin was trading at around $20,190 by market close, according to data from TradingView.
BTCUSD Chart by TradingView
The biggest declines were from Iris Energy Ltd. (-10.94%), Stronghold Digital Mining (-9.56%) and Riot Blockchain (-6.13%).
